entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
